001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render;
002
003import java.util.Base64;
004
005import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreFileUtils.encodeBase64;
006
007/**
008 * Utility-class to wrap inner-HTML or inner-SVG with outer HTML-tags
009 */
010public class OuterTagUtils {
011
012    public static String outerDivStyle(String innerHtml, String outerStyle) {
013        return String.format("""
014            <div style="font-family: monospace; font-size: 14px; %s">
015            %s</div>""",
016            outerStyle,
017            innerHtml.indent(2)
018        );
019    }
020
021    public static String outerDivCss(String innerHtml, String outerClassName) {
022        return String.format("""
023            <div style="font-family: monospace; font-size: 14px;" class="%s">
024            %s</div>""",
025            outerClassName,
026            innerHtml.indent(2)
027        );
028    }
029
030    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
031
032    public static int totalWidthPX(int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen) {
033        return roundCeil(fontSizePX * 0.61 * maxRowLen + 4);
034    }
035
036    public static int totalHeightPX(int fontSizePX, int rowsCount) {
037        return roundCeil(fontSizePX * 1.2 * (rowsCount + 0.2) + 2);
038    }
039
040    public static int roundCeil(double valueDouble) {
041        return Math.toIntExact(Math.round(Math.ceil(valueDouble)));
042    }
043
044    public static String outerSvgAttrs(
045            String innerSvg,
046            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
047            String outerStyle) {
048        return String.format("""
049                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
050                     style="%s"
051                     width="%dpx"
052                     height="%dpx">
053                <text font-family="monospace" font-size="%dpx" style="white-space: pre;">
054                %s</text>
055                </svg>""",
056            outerStyle,
057            totalWidthPX(fontSizePX, maxRowLen),
058            totalHeightPX(fontSizePX, rowsCount),
059            fontSizePX,
060            innerSvg.indent(2)
061        );
062    }
063
064    public static String outerSvgClass(
065            String innerSvg,
066            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
067            String outerClassName) {
068        return String.format("""
069                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
070                     class="%s"
071                     width="%dpx"
072                     height="%dpx">
073                <text font-family="monospace" font-size="%dpx" style="white-space: pre;">
074                %s</text>
075                </svg>""",
076            outerClassName,
077            totalWidthPX(fontSizePX, maxRowLen),
078            totalHeightPX(fontSizePX, rowsCount),
079            fontSizePX,
080            innerSvg.indent(2)
081        );
082    }
083
084    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
085
086    public static String outerImgSvgAttrs(
087            String innerSvg,
088            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
089            String outerStyle) {
090        return embeddedSvgTag(outerSvgAttrs(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle));
091    }
092
093    public static String outerImgSvgClass(
094            String innerSvg,
095            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
096            String outerClassName) {
097        return embeddedSvgTag(outerSvgClass(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerClassName));
098    }
099
100    public static String embeddedSvgTag(String outerSvgTag) {
101        return String.format("""
102            <img alt="embedded SVG-iamge" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,%s" />""",
103            encodeBase64(outerSvgTag)
104        );
105    }
106
107    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
108
109    public static String outerHtml(String outerTag, String title) {
110        return String.format("""
111            <!DOCTYPE html>
112            <html lang="en">
113            <head>
114              <title>%s</title>
115              <meta charset="utf-8">
116              <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
117            </head>
118            <body>
119            %s
120            </body>
121            </html>""",
122            title, outerTag);
123    }
124
125    public static String outerHtmlDivStyle(String innerHtml, String outerStyle, String title) {
126        return outerHtml(outerDivStyle(innerHtml, outerStyle), title);
127    }
128
129    public static String outerHtmlDivCss(String innerHtml, String outerClassName, String title) {
130        // TODO: there should be HTML-style section generated properly in HTML-head
131        return outerHtml(outerDivCss(innerHtml, outerClassName), title);
132    }
133
134    public static String outerHtmlSvgAttrs(
135            String innerSvg,
136            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
137            String outerStyle, String title) {
138        return outerHtml(outerSvgAttrs(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle), title);
139    }
140
141    public static String outerHtmlSvgClass(
142            String innerSvg,
143            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
144            String outerClassName, String title) {
145        // TODO: there should be HTML-style section generated properly in HTML-head
146        return outerHtml(outerSvgClass(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerClassName), title);
147    }
148
149    public static String outerHtmlImgSvgAttrs(
150        String innerSvg,
151        int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
152        String outerStyle, String title) {
153        return outerHtml(outerImgSvgAttrs(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle), title);
154    }
155
156    public static String outerHtmlImgSvgClass(
157        String innerSvg,
158        int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
159        String outerClassName, String title) {
160        // TODO: there should be HTML-style section generated properly in HTML-head
161        return outerHtml(outerImgSvgClass(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerClassName), title);
162    }
163
164    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
165
166    private OuterTagUtils() {
167        // prohibit the creation of utility-class instance
168        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot instantiate utility-class " + getClass().getName());
169    }
170}
